item.title: Blocked road drain, Algernon Rd near junction Loampit Vale, 9th June
item.description:
Appears full of engine oil. Has been blocked for over 3 months. Heavy rain run-off from Algernon Rd is contributing to flooding under railway bridge on Loampit Vale.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Algernon Road, Ladywell, London

item.title: Cable Box Graffiti, 9th June
item.description:
Email received by CSC inbox 07/06/25 18:58 Hi You have received a request via Love Clean Streets to remedy an issue within your Service Area Graffiti - Non offensive Lat/Long - 51.4220693, -0.0554239 what3words - burn.brush.poems Nearest address - 105A, Venner Road, Sydenham, London, SE26 5HU Extra location information if given - Remove graffiti from cable box Reference - 4778048
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 105, Venner Road, Penge, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Raised manhole, 9th June
item.description:

item.title: Pkease kindly sweep bottles and food waste and paper rubbish, 9th June
item.description:
Gladiator Street, we miss our Irish sweepstake, he is wonderful and cleans up our dirty riad, whwre has he been? Please can he come and sweep up as dangerous with bottles around children and elderly trip over, wind blows rubbish all over pavements. Many thanks.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gladiator Street, Honor Oak, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Manhole completely sunk., 9th June
item.description:
This manhole has sunk over 6 inches in about 2 years and never been repaired, only tarmac has been filled into it, now Lfb fire hydrant is leaking and all tarmac has now come out and very dangerous for pedestrians and cyclists.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Northend Road, North End, London

item.title: Driving over pavement, 9th June
